description: Structural notes page containing statement of special inspection, seismic and wind design criteria, concrete specifications with strength and mix requirements, reinforcement standards with rebar cover table, and general structural construction notes referencing 2022 CBC.
key_content: Seismic Design Category: D, Site Class: D
Seismic Importance Factor p = 1.3, Risk Category II
Basic Wind Speed = 95 MPH, Exposure Category B, Iw = 1.00
Diaphragm R = 6.5, Equivalent Lateral Force Procedure
Floor live load: 40 PSF, Roof live load: 20 PSF
Concrete: 2,500 PSI (W/C 0.65 normal) or 3,000 PSI (W/C 0.45 moderate)
Type V Portland Cement conforming to ASTM C150
Rebar: ASTM A-615, Grade 60; smooth dowels ASTM A36
Rebar cover: 3" against earth, 2" exposed weather (#4+), 1-1/2" exposed weather (#4-), 3/4" interior slabs/walls
Class B lap splices unless noted otherwise
Non-shrink grout: 7,000 PSI minimum at 28 days
Special inspection required: wood shear walls, diaphragms, concrete, reinforcing steel, epoxy dowels
NOT SHOWN: lumber grade specification (covered on SN2)
NOT SHOWN: nailing schedule (covered on SN2)
NOT SHOWN: engineered wood product specs (covered on SN2)

drawing_zones.content: Statement of Special Inspection (5 items) and Design Criteria (seismic, wind, vertical loads)
Concrete specifications (10 items) and Reinforcement notes (6 items) with rebar cover table
